subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Witnesses
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities, who have been investigating cyclist Lance Armstrong on suspicion of crimes relating to doping, want to know if the encounter at an Aspen restaurant constituted witness tampering.
snippet: Federal authorities, who have been investigating cyclist Lance Armstrong on suspicion of crimes relating to doping, want to know if the encounter at an Aspen restaurant constituted witness tampering.
